ygData.subject: Re: Re: Lots o Wizard groups
ygData.msgSnippet: ... The highest of the songs is Level 15. By the time they really start using them in the Mid 20s and up they should be really effective. True, Accelerando
ygData.messageBody:
At 04:08 PM 10/8/99 -0700, you wrote:
>I guess this argument could go on forever but it looks to me like your
>talking about outdoor zones specifically. How can I dispute somthing that
>I have never seen? I cant. Becasue I have never seen a bard as the puller.
>Mind if I ask what level all those songs are?


The highest of the songs is Level 15. By the time they really
start using them in the Mid 20s and up they should be really effective.
True, Accelerando only works outdoors, but the other 2 spells work indoors
and they are what is used to pull anyways. Accelerando is only for hauling
ass back to the party or the zone.
